Frequently Asked Questions

Everything you need to know about Tekcify and our products

Tekcify is an AI-driven technology company that provides tools for instant communication, document management, and student networking.

Yes! Tekcify operates a unified system, so you only need one login for everything.

Some features are free, while advanced capabilities require a subscription or premium access.

Binx AI is WhatsApp-based, meaning you can chat, send voice notes, and analyze images directly in your WhatsApp chats.

PDFX not only converts and generates PDFs, but it also allows you to chat with documents, summarize content, and analyze YouTube videos.

Campux is in development! Sign up for the waitlist to be notified upon launch.
